name: Tim Reaper - Death in Training
description:
From Spartasoft Game Jam (48h) of October 2020

Game Jam Theme: Grim Reaper

You play as Tim Reaper, the son of the grim reaper. The game is set around a cabin. Your goal is to interact with the environment in ways that bring about the demise of the campers.

This game might be updated to fix bugs, add missing content, or possibly add levels.

Credits:

Abby Pearson - Art

Will Lacey - Sound & Design

Michael Burkett - Programming

Matthew Burkett - Programming
